name: Cave Escape (itch) (capnflannel)
description:
Prototype submission "Cave Escape" for Go Godot Jam 2 - Theme: Energy Source

Controls:

Use Arrow Keys/WASD to move around

Use SPACE to turn on/off search light

Gameplay:

Your Energy is continuously Draining!

Push Rocks out of your way!

Collect Gems to regenerate Energy!

Your Speed reduces as your Energy is depleted!

Escape the cave before you run out of energy!

This was my first crack at using Godot, so I learned a lot from this experience!

Thanks for playing!

Tools Used:

  • Godot v3.4
  • MS Paint
  • GIMP v2.10.28

Note: This was exported as a GLES3 game and thus may not work well in all browsers.
